name: Robot Tadpole
description:
You're a Robot Tadpole. Your goal is to inject the Fleshy Tadpoles with robot DNA. Observe the tadpole's movements, then prick them with the DNA injector and select the DNA that matches the tadpole's actions. Watch out for the cannibals in later levels, once they've eaten another tadpole's tail it's a countdown to certain death. Have fun!

  • HOLD LEFT MOUSE: Move Robot Tadpole
  • HOLD RIGHT MOUSE: Robot Tadpole Sprint
  • ESCAPE: View DNA descriptions
  • Q: Prick Tadpole

For the best experience, run the game in fullscreen, otherwise my broken scaling system makes textures blurry. For the record, I know the solution, I need to redo all textures, but I'm not doing that, I've got economics homework to do.

If you encounter any bugs please let me know in the comments, thanks!

  • LEVEL DIFFICULTY RANKINGS
    • LEVEL 1: easy
    • LEVEL 2: easy
    • LEVEL 3: easy
    • LEVEL 4: moderate
    • LEVEL 5: moderate
    • LEVEL 6: easy
    • LEVEL 7: hard
    • LEVEL 8: hard
    • LEVEL 9: very hard
    • LEVEL 10: very hard
